Food with Matt.title: Food with Matt

moods.comment: I don't like it when he takes my food

Food with Matt.advice1: Be assertive. Layout groundrules for when or if sharing/taking food is okay.
Food with Matt.advice2: Discuss potentially buying groceries together or set up a reimbursement system.
Food with Matt.advice3: Have one final discussion, before informing a house advisor.
Food with Matt.q1: Have you been able to observe any additional behavior?

Dishes with Ryan.title: Dishes with Ryan

moods.comment: I hate how he leaves his dishes

Dishes with Ryan.advice1: Be assertive. Discuss your expectations of how clean the apartment should be.
Dishes with Ryan.advice2: Implement a chore schedule. This is the easiest way to lay down expectation and goals.
Dishes with Ryan.advice3: Have one final discussion, before informing a house advisor.
Dishes with Ryan.q1: Have you been able to observe any additional behavior?

Guests with Emma.title: Guests with Emma
Guests with Emma.description: Emma always has friends and guests like 24/7

moods.comment: I cant sleep cause its so loud from all the guests.

Guests with Emma.advice1: Mention the issue, but be sure not to place blame.
Guests with Emma.advice2: Communicate your concerns and why it is important to you.
Guests with Emma.advice3: Have one final discussion, before informing a house advisor.
Guests with Emma.q1: Have you been able to observe any additional behavior?
